name: Minimal Theme

grid_styles.container: grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-4 sm:gap-6

print_styles: @media print { * { box-shadow: none !important; text-shadow: none !important; } body { background: white !important; color: black !important; font-size: 10pt; } .container { max-width: none !important; margin: 0 !important; padding: 0.5cm !important; } .grid { display: grid !important; grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr) !important; gap: 0.5cm !important; } @media print and (max-width: 8.5in) { .grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr !important; } } .card { page-break-inside: avoid; margin-bottom: 0.5cm; border-bottom: 2px solid #000 !important; } .text-blue-700, .text-purple-700, .text-blue-600, .text-purple-600 { color: #333 !important; } table { border-collapse: collapse !important; } td, th { border: 1px solid #000 !important; } }
